> One comment: The lowest experience level of my own 100% legitimate 
> team is experience level 94. It has been through all the built-in 
> scenarios, the tevfifty and my own set.  I am concerned about 
crashing 
> the game because of acquiring too much experience for a single 
player.
> 
> One Question: What scenarios should a player have completed before 
> going into the Unix series into order to avoid problems handling 
the 
> opponents?

The levels: Inside Cenwhit Manor, Jarketa's Gates, Castle Interrior, 
and The Please Register Scen. (Scen0)

After second testing which I did today I had probs. with the 
elementals, they always slaughter half of my men. My men were in L. 
50 with 100-120 exp. in everything.
Question: Should the 2nd one be more painful to the player?
